Batros Marina Residences está inspirado: Batros Marina Residences is inspired by contemporary Mexican architecture. The elegant and timeless design results in a sober and elegant building, in neutral colours, which integrates harmoniously into its surroundings where its inhabitants will truly feel at home.
Batros Marina Residences colinda con uno: Batros Marina Residences adjoins one of the most famous golf courses in the country: Marina Vallarta Golf Club, an extraordinary 18-hole course designed by the famous American architect Joe Finger, framed by abundant nature, lakes and spectacular views of the mountains of the Sierra Madre and the Pacific.

Batros Marina Residences estará en el co: Batros Marina Residences will be in the heart of Marina Vallarta, one of the most exclusive residential areas with the highest added value in the entire bay.

A lo largo de toda la bahía encontraras: Throughout the entire bay you will find a wide variety of beaches, many of these within a short distance of Batros Marina Residences, you can find the Krystal beach about 10 minutes away or the Holy beach about 15 minutes away.
Tiene más de 22 años de trayectoria cons: It has more than 22 years of experience building in Guadalajara and Puerto Vallarta. From our first day of work to date, we have carried out more than 21 developments, 527 homes, 8,755 M2 of Commercial Spaces; Five Service Stations (Gas Stations). All this respecting our values and meeting the expectations of our customers. We are committed to the long term, we have more than 7,000 m2 of land reserve for the following developments.

Con más de 30 años de experiencia, somos: With more than 30 years of experience, we are a real estate fund rooted in the prosperous region of Puerto Vallarta and Riviera Nayarit. We are proud of our comprehensive collaboration between Real Estate Developments, Construction and Real Estate, joining forces to offer a unique experience.
Somos un fondo inmobiliario ubicado en l: We are a real estate fund located in the area of Puerto Vallarta and Riviera Nayarit with more than 30 years of experience, we distinguish ourselves by working together with Real Estate Developments, Construction and Real Estate; team of committed professionals to ensure you find the lifestyle you require. The union of these 3 divisions is what makes Grupo G-18 one of the best funds in the area.

Somos un equipo cuyo principal objetivo: We are a team whose main objective is to enrich people's lives with high-level sustainable spaces.

Estilo de vida moderno, belleza y la arm: Modern lifestyle, beauty and harmony of nature.
El diseño de este proyecto se enfoca en: The design of this project focuses on creating spaces that integrate perfectly with the environment, maximizing the use of spaces and allowing users to enjoy the direct connection with nature.
Caza Mabó es un proyecto arquitectónico: Caza Mabó is an architectural project that seeks to create a space that combines the comfort of modern lifestyle with the beauty and harmony of nature. The design of this project focuses on creating spaces that integrate perfectly with the environment, maximizing the use of spaces and allowing users to enjoy the direct connection with nature.
Una de las características principales d: One of the main features of Caza Mabó is the presence of large windows and balconies in each of the rooms and common areas, allowing the transition between inside and outside to be smooth and natural. In this way, users can enjoy the surrounding landscape at all times, generating a feeling of harmony and tranquility.
